context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Surgery,Gap Closing,Dental Crowns,
review: NDC has top notch safety protocols when it come to sanitization and hygiene standards. Their work ethic will guarantee patient satisfaction. I have always turned to NDC for any kind of dental problems, not just for myself but for any near and dear one. Really impressed with their professionalism. This clinic has helped me overcome my apprehension from dental treatment. With highly skilled and empathatic professionals and best protective measures for infection control, I am happy and satisfied patient. Dr. Sunehra is a great asset to NDC for sure. She has taken care of all my dental issues and guided me step by step on what needs to be done with procedures. Even if I had to change my appointments, she made herself flexible to get required treatment on my dental problems with excellent quality. It is been a year and I didn‚Äôt have any problem post treatment. Team of highly professional  young doctors to address the problem with modern instruments and latest technology. Sophisticated equipment, professional conduct, reasonable pricing, doctors are knowledgeable. Highly recommended for everyone.

Recently i have noticed some pain, swelling and went to this clinic for consultation. Dr.Sunehra done excellent diagnosis and identified that there is more infection in my teeth.They have noticed that the infection spreading to the teeth beside the problematic one as well. Advised fillings for some teeth & root canal for 1 teeth  Dr.Saranya is very well experienced in root canal and Dr.veena as well in cap.They have planned my treatment and within three sittings(root canal 2 sittings and 1 sitting for crown) they have done excellent treatment.They took very good care during pre & post procedures of the root canal. The equipment, hospitality in the clinic is very well maintained from entrance to the treatment.It is highly recommended if you have any dental issues for better care and treatment at reasonable pricing. Many thanks for Dr.Sunehra & madam komali  for their care and concern through out the treatment.

I usually doubt dental doctors, that is why I never went to any dental doctor so far, but for when I came to know about Dr sunehra through my frd, I immediately went to see her. I am very much impressed by her courteous behaviour besides explaining the exact treatment required for my teeth. I have good teeth except one teeth required something like root canal and cap fitting over them. Rootcanal dr. Saranya is very polite & explaning every step during the procedure & cap doctor dr. Veena is nice.It was done within a week time without any trouble. I am perfect now with all my 32 teeth intact. His clinic is very big and have everything that needs for dental care and treatments. From reception to the treatment everything was good. I wish Dr.sunehra all the staff good luck. Thank you doctor & the staff. I'll definitely suggest this clinic to all my friends & family membe.
I very happy for the treatment with out pain . Thank you so much and your advices. Thank you NDC. I hope you better to visit to NDC
Yeah it's a good experience. Treatment was good . And explained the problem in detail. Stuff service is good.
Doctor could have spent little more time to check if any cavities are forming and give advice on how take care of the teeth

Nice treatment ...I had done my treatment without any pain 
Doctors & staff are good üëçüòä will definitely recommend to other's
